Name: sourcefile
column6: full path name of the configuration file

Name: sourceline
column6: line number within the configuration file where the entry appears

Name: seqno
column6: order in which the entries are processed (1..n)

Name: setting
column6: value to be assigned to the parameter

Name: applied
column6: true if the value can be applied successfully

Name: error
column6: if not null, an error message indicating why this entry could not be applied
